tcs.TermsAndConditions:
At the end of the agreement there are three options: i) pay the optional final payment and own the vehicle; ii) return the vehicle: subject to excess mileage and fair wear and tear, charges may apply; or iii) replace: part exchange the vehicle.
With Solutions Personal Contract Plan. *Payable with optional final payment. **Excess mileage excludes VAT at the current rate. 18s+. Subject to availability and status. T&Cs apply. Exclusions may apply. Indemnities may be required. Subject to changes in vehicle or equipment prices. Offers are not available in conjunction with any other offer and may be varied or withdrawn at any time. Accurate at 05/2021. Freepost Volkswagen Financial Services.
